title: Schism
description: When Garret returns home for Christmas, he receives a message from his uncle reminding him of a game of predictions they played when Garret was young. He had completely forgotten about the game, but he now sees that the first three predictions already came true. And he soon discovers that there is another new power growing inside him—the power to move objects with his mind.But will his new powers be able to stop the fourth prediction—death—from coming true?
author: Ronan Gallagher
